name: Sumankumari
summary: Human Resource Professional with over 4 years of experience in Recruitment, Organization Development, Time Management, Training & Development, Performance Management, Employee Engagement, TPM & Audit. Former Assistant Manager - HR (Generalist) with VARROC POLYMERS PVT. LTD, involved in SAP, audits, and HR operations. Proficient in recruitment, training design and delivery, employee engagement, and HR administration with strong communication and analytical skills; quick learner and a mentor capable of implementing processes and driving improvements.
skills: MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Internet Applications)

experience.title: Assistant Manager - HR (Generalist)

experience.title: Assistant Manager - HR
